oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate veterans reunion "ladder" badge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Silver Confederate veteran reunion," ladder" badge that belonged to Samuel Hunter Bennett, Co. H, 4th Tenn. Cav. Regt. According to family lore, Bennett enlisted at age 17 and served until the surrender of the Army of Tennessee in 1865. He returned to; Marion County, Tennessee after the war and was active in veteran organizations. He died at age 81. Much of his farm was inundated by Hale and Nickajack dams.
